job.title: Network Engineer // Cisco // DFW
job.description:
Motion Recruitment is partnering up with a global leader in Infrastructure Services to help them bring on a Cisco Network Engineer. This will be a 3 month contract-to-hire position in Irving, Texas.
As a Cisco Network Engineer, your scope of work will involve new virtual ASA configurations within a cloud environment for disaster recovery services.
Skills & Experience
3+ years of Network Administration experience (routers, switches, firewalls
Experience supporting Cisco network infrastructure and devices
Expertise with Cisco Routing and Switching - Catalyst series required, Nexxus a plus
Experience with Wireless LAN Controllers (WLCs, WAPs)
Basic troubleshooting and supporting firewalls (Cisco ASA / Firepower; Palo Alto, Checkpoint)
CCNA or CCNP
The Offer
Competitive Pay: Up to $60/hr, DOE
Contract Duration: 3 month contract-to-hire
You Will Receive The Following Benefts
Medical & Dental Insurance
Health Savings Account (HSA)
Paid Time Off
Pre-tax Commuter Benefits
Posted By:
Carolyn Regimbal
